text: Failure of Engineer Garin () is a 1973 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze.Театр "Зазеркалье" представил новый мюзиклКРАХ ИНЖЕНЕРА ГАРИНА It stars Oleg Borisov, Aleksandr Belyavskiy, and Vasili Korzun. ==Actors== * Oleg Borisov as Pyotr Garin * Aleksandr Belyavskiy as Vasili Shelga * Vasili Korzun as Rolling * Nonna Terentyeva as Zoe Montrose * Vladimir Tatosov as Tyklinski * Mikhail Volkov as Sсhefer * Alexander Kaidanovsky as Dr. Wolf * Grigori Gaj as Reicher * Anatoli Shvedersky as Ditz == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze
title: Failure of Engineer Garin
